results.description: Watch Afghanistan chase down their run target to beat Ireland and reach the 2019 Cricket World Cup.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Afghanistan batsmen end Ireland World Cup hopes
results.title: Ireland v Afghanistan: How Afghan batsmen chased down target- highlights

results.description: Ireland miss out on a World Cup place as Afghanistan prevail by five wickets in the winner-takes-all Super Sixes match in Harare.
results.shortTitle: Afghans beat Ireland to make World Cup
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Afghans progress by beating Ireland in Super Sixes finale

thumbnail.altText: Afghanistan wicketkeeper Mohammad Shahzad closes in as Paul Stirling plays a shot
Afghanistan wicketkeeper Mohammad Shahzad closes in as Paul Stirling plays a shot
Afghanistan wicketkeeper Mohammad Shahzad closes in as Paul Stirling plays a shot
Afghanistan wicketkeeper Mohammad Shahzad closes in as Paul Stirling plays a shot

results.description: Afghanistan's Mohammad Shahzad hits a six out of the ground during their World Cup qualifier against Ireland.
results.shortTitle: 'Straight over the roof' - Shahzad hits huge six
results.title: Watch as Mohammad Shahzad hits huge six for Afghanistan against Ireland

results.description: Watch live clips from the ICC World Cup qualifying match between Ireland and Afghanistan at the Harare Sports Club, Harare.
results.shortTitle: Live in-play clips: Ireland v Afghanistan World Cup Qualifier
results.title: Watch live clips as Ireland face Afghanistan in the ICC World Cup Qualifier

results.description: Watch highlights as Scotland's hopes of reaching the 2019 Cricket World Cup are over after rain in Harare halts their run-chase to send the West Indies through.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Scotland miss out on 2019 World Cup
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Scotland miss out on 2019 World Cup after West Indies defeat

thumbnail.altText: Scotland miss out on 2019 World Cup

results.description: Scotland's Richie Berrington is given out lbw to a ball that replays appear to show was heading down the leg side during their World Cup Qualifier game with West Indies.
results.shortTitle: Did this controversial wicket cost Scotland a World Cup place?
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Did this controversial wicket cost Scotland a World Cup place?

results.description: Scotland miss out on the 2019 World Cup as West Indies qualify - after the Scots' run chase is curtailed by rain, with them five runs behind on DLS.
results.shortTitle: Relive Scotland's World Cup heartbreak as Windies go through
results.title: West Indies reach 2019 World Cup, Scotland out - World Cup Qualifier, Harare Sports Club

results.description: Paul Stirling scored a century as Ireland beat UAE by 226 runs to clinch a place in the Super Six stage of the World Cup series.
results.shortTitle: Ireland beat UAE to seal Super Six spot
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Ireland beat UAE to seal Super Six spot

results.description: Captain William Porterfield scores a century as Ireland beat Papua New Guinea by four wickets to continue winning start in World Cup Qualifier.
results.shortTitle: Ireland battle to World Cup win over PNG
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Ireland beat Papua New Guinea to keep up winning start

results.description: Kyle Coetzer hits an unbeaten 41 to help Scotland to a four-wicket World Cup Qualifier victory over Hong Kong.
results.shortTitle: Coetzer steers Scots to World Cup Qualifier win
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Kyle Coetzer steers Scotland to win over Hong Kong

results.description: Ireland make a winning start to the World Cup Qualifier tournament with a 93-run victory over Netherlands in Zimbabwe.
results.title: World Cup Qualifier: Ireland defeat Netherlands in Harare opener

results.description: Fixtures, reports and scorecards as West Indies and Afghanistan claim the last two places at the 2019 World Cup.
results.title: ICC World Cup Qualifier 2018

thumbnail.altText: West Indies captain Jason Holder and Afghanistan skipper Asghar Stanikzai
